backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile management, game CRUD operations with creator authorization, access control integration, and blob storage mixins; includes admin-only creator listing functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: game selection interface with Flappy Bird, fully playable Flappy Bird implementation, and integration into GamePlayer component alongside existing games.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files covering UI components, hooks, routing, styling, and functionality including chat, math solver, media generation, translation, music generator, art canvas, and game features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components with grayscale and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags, PWA manifest link, canonical URL, JSON-LD structured data for WebApplication schema, and theme color configuration.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling using OKLCH colors, tabbed navigation interface, Inter and Poppins fonts, and responsive card-based layout for showcasing features.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata with standalone display mode, black theme, and icon configurations for 192x192 and 512x512 sizes with maskable purpose.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths without restrictions.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing nine URLs (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities, change frequencies, and last modified dates for SEO indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games, and shared content, wrapped in ThemeProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, AI art idea generator chat, and artwork sharing/download functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session history with timestamps, new chat creation button, and session selection functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component that displays messages between user and AI assistant with auto-scrolling, typing indicators, and message input with keyboard shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with reset and reload options, showing error details in a styled card interface.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Game library browser with search, filtering by creator type (all/user/AI), game cards display, and delete functionality for owned games with GamePlayer integration.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Displays a game card with title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and visual styling for the game thumbnail.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog that presents three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Uses a grid layout with icon buttons.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Renders games in an iframe with fullscreen support, high score tracking, and game templates (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong). Handles score submission and game state management.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Form-based game creation interface where authenticated users can input title, description, and HTML/CSS/JavaScript code to create custom games. Includes validation and navigation after successful creation.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Game catalogue browser with search, filtering (all/user/AI), and pagination. Displays games in a grid and opens GamePlayer modal when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, theme toggle (light/dark), user profile display, and sign-out button. Sticky positioned with backdrop blur effect.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver with difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), step-by-step solutions, concept explanations, and a homework helper mode with chat-like interface. Evaluates expressions client-side.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: React component for AI media generation with tabs for images and videos, featuring prompt inputs, generation buttons, and galleries displaying generated media with metadata.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component supporting both AI-generated audio from prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with playback, sharing, and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Dialog component displaying a grid of predefined classic games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) with selection functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup, collecting the user's name and saving it with default game statistics.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: Chat-style interface for generating code snippets from natural language descriptions, with message history and code copying functionality.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Viewer component for displaying shared artwork or music content by ID, with loading states, error handling, and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: React component that provides a chat-style translation interface with language selection dropdowns, translation history display, and input handling for text translation between multiple languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing it with Internet Identity when available and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Custom hook that generates art idea suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) by returning randomized creative prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Custom hook for sharing artwork that generates local artwork IDs and provides URL copying functionality; backend artwork persistence has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Custom hook that generates simple synthesized audio using Web Audio API based on text prompts, creating melodies from C major scale notes and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom hook that manages HTML canvas drawing state and operations including brush color, size, erasing mode, mouse/touch event handling, and canvas clearing functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Custom hook for managing chat sessions that now returns empty data as backend session support has been removed; provides local session ID generation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Custom hook that fetches game catalogue data from the backend actor and provides queries for all games, individual game metadata, categories, and games filtered by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: React Query hooks for managing game CRUD operations (getAllGames, getGame, createGame, deleteGame) using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Custom hook that manages game high scores using localStorage, providing queries to retrieve high scores and mutations to update them when new scores exceed current records.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Hook for generating mock AI images and videos using canvas, creating placeholder media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Hook for sharing music by generating local music IDs and copy-to-clipboard URLs; backend music persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Hook for AI script generation chat interface that produces mock code snippets (React, Python, JavaScript, API calls) based on user prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving shared artwork and music content; both features throw errors as backend support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Hook for mock text translation between languages with history tracking, generating simple phrase translations for common greetings and thanks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using the actor, with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark teal/coral color theme for UI components, sidebar, and charts using HSL color space.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional Tailwind CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up the root with QueryClient provider and InternetIdentity provider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Complete Flappy Bird game template exported as an HTML string with embedded canvas-based game logic, bird physics, pipe generation, collision detection, and scoring system.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Error logging utility class that captures, stores, and outputs log entries with different severity levels (info, warning, error, critical) to console and maintains a rolling buffer of recent logs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utility functions for extracting query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container queries, typography plugin, custom animations, and design tokens for a component library.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the game hub application state with existing features for Flappy Bird and other games, image requirements for sprites, and pending feature requests.
